import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Small_logo from "./images/Small_logo.jpg" import "./edit.css" import history from '../history' import TwitterLogo from "./images/twitter.png" export class Edit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { first_name:"", last_name:"", bio:"", username:"", token:localStorage.getItem("token"), savemessage:"", error_message:"" } } com savedata=()=>{ axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/profile/edit/",this.state).then(response=>{ console.log(response); this.setState({savemessage:response.data["message"]}) }).catch(error=>{ console.log(error.response); this.setState({error_message:error.response.data["message"]}) }) console.log(this.state.token); } firstnamechange=(event)=>{ this.setState({first_name:event.target.value}) } lastnamechange=(event)=>{ this.setState({last_name:event.target.value}) } userbiochange=(event)=>{ this.setState({bio:event.target.value}) } render() { const{first_name,last_name,bio,savemessage,error_message}=this.state return (










{first_name} {last_name}
{username}












{savemessage}
{error_message}
) } } export default Edit
